businesses.name: African American History and Genealogical Study Group of Evanston
businesses.description: Began in 2005.  Meets twice monthly, every other Tuesday evening, at the Levy center discussing African-American history and genealogy.

businesses.name: Blaze the Floor Dance Studio
businesses.description: The studio provides dance instruction to children and adults.  Several types of dance instruction are offered:  Ballroom, Latin, Latin American, Special Event Choreography

businesses.name: Fleetwood-Jourdain Theater
businesses.description: From original plays to the best of Broadway, Fleetwood-Jourdain Theater is committed to supplying the very best in theater.
